name: Skype Web Control – Free chat & call
author: Skype

sections.description:
Answer your visitor’s questions faster.

We’ve made it faster and easier for people to reach you straight from your site. Skype Web Control puts a Skype chat & call window into any website. It is easy to integrate and supports both desktop and mobile sites.
sections.installation:
1. Download and install the plugin from WordPress dashboard.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your Skype ID or if you have a bot, the Microsoft App ID.
  4. Customize the colors to your liking
  5. Click on “Save”
sections.faq:
To learn more about the Skype Web Control, please visit our developer page: https://dev.skype.com/webcontrol

Installation Instructions

  1. Download and install the plugin from WordPress dashboard.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your Skype ID or if you have a bot, the Microsoft App ID.
  4. Customize the colors to your liking
  5. Click on “Save”

short_description: Have a free Skype live chat and/or call window on your website to answer your visitor's question as fast as possible.
description:
Answer your visitor’s questions faster.

We’ve made it faster and easier for people to reach you straight from your site. Skype Web Control puts a Skype chat & call window into any website. It is easy to integrate and supports both desktop and mobile sites.
